title: Canada heatwave: Lightning strikes trigger wildfires in British Columbia
content:
1. Canada heatwave: Lightning strikes trigger wildfires in British Columbia  BBC News
  2. Wildfire amid record heat wave forces entire village in Canada to evacuate: "The whole town is on fire"  CBS News
  3. Wildfires, record heat spark 'fire-breathing dragon of clouds' over western Canada  New York Post
  4. B.C. three weeks ahead of schedule in wildfire activity; two reported deaths in Lytton  News 1130
  5. Town ravaged by wildfire after enduring Canada’s all-time hottest temps  Fox News
